timeline.message:
Core - Duplicate candidates

* In old implementation method 'createMemberCandidate' could find duplicate
candidates for the same user and it was confusing for our users.
* If the method finds user for some  candidate now, then returns only user.
If method finds more users, then returns only one of them. If method does not
find any user for the candidate, then returns only the candidate.

Core - Duplicate candidates

* In old implementation method 'createMemberCandidate' could find duplicate
candidates for the same user and it was confusing for our users.
* If the method finds user for some  candidate now, then returns only user.
If method finds more users, then returns only one of them. If method does not
find any user for the candidate, then returns only the candidate.
